metadata.name: Suspicious WSMAN Provider Image Loads
metadata.comment: Detects signs of potential use of the WSMAN provider from uncommon processes locally and remote execution.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (((endswith(lower(module.file.path), lower('\\wsmsvc.dll')) OR endswith(lower(module.file.path), lower('\\wsmauto.dll')) OR endswith(lower(module.file.path), lower('\\microsoft.wsman.management.ni.dll'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('wsmsvc\.dll', 'wsmanautomation\.dll', 'microsoft\.wsman\.management\.dll')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\svchost.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wsmwmipl.dll')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\sdiagnhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\services.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s bits')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('svchost.exe -k graphicsperfsvcgroup -s graphicsperfsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('svchost.exe -k networkservice -p -s wecsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('svchost.exe -k netsvcs')) OR (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\microsoft.net\\framework64\\v')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\microsoft.net\\framework\\v'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mscorsvw.exe')) OR lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('c:\\windows\\system32\\configure-smremoting\.exe', 'c:\\windows\\system32\\servermanager\.exe') OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\asgard2-agent\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\citrix\\')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell_ise.exe')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\$windows.~bt\\sources\\'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\svchost.exe')) AND process.cmd_line is null))

output.summary: Detects signs of potential use of the WSMAN provider from uncommon processes locally and remote execution.
